meanings.definition: Having a fantastic or deceptive appearance or effect
meanings.sent1: The magician's phantasmagorical tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The movie's special effects created a phantasmagorical world on screen.
meanings.sent3: The phantasmagorical costume made everyone at the party do a double-take.
meanings.sent4: Her phantasmagorical makeup transformed her into a mystical creature.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted a phantasmagorical sky of vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: A constantly shifting complex succession of things seen or imagined
meanings.sent1: The kaleidoscope created a phantasmagorical display of colors.
meanings.sent2: His dreams were filled with a phantasmagorical mix of creatures and landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The artist's painting was a phantasmagorical blend of reality and fantasy.
meanings.sent4: The city at night was a phantasmagorical maze of lights and shadows.
meanings.sent5: The forest was a phantasmagorical realm of mystery and wonder.
